dWgOGeigHy76JbStu2ya7w.text: A lovely, calm cafe with a simple but good menu. I've tried their espresso drinks, hot chocolate, soup, baked goods, and grilled cheese, and all were delicious. Every time I come in, the owner is kind and helpful. Reasonable prices. There is always plenty of seating and good wifi, so it's the perfect quiet place to study. My only caveat is that, like another reviewer said, it is very cold, so bring some warm clothes!

4-4uLOfTaff6WnGhRDtYaw.text: Jeelie piece didn't really do it for me, there was not a very big selection of cakes, no plain scones only fruit, no sweetners only sugar and no decaffinated hot drinks to choose from, so didn't really cater to everyone which isnt good business in my opinion and it was very expensive so apologies but jeelie piece wont be my first choice to visit or to reccommend.

q0qbKvd3yNTqtCE0Ly7fzQ.text: Came in here for a quick coffee before meeting other friends. Big space, nice decorated, decent coffee... No skimmed milk! But freezing! Kept my coat and gloves on the whole time :(. Put the heating on guys.
